chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall m : state, union_std_def m -> forall m0 : state, union_std_def m0 -> union_std_def (M2 prec_list m m0)

Premises:
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
union_std_def = fun s0 : state => forall (s1 : state) (d : preDTA) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat s0 s1 -> state_reconnait d s0 (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl s0 s1) (app c tl) /\ state_reconnait d (union_mpl s1 s0) (app c tl) : state -> Prop
state = Map prec_list : Set
union_s1d_2 : forall m : state, union_s_prd1 m -> forall m0 : state, union_s_prd1 m0 -> union_s_prd1 (M2 prec_list m m0)
mpl_compat_8_2 : forall m : state, mpl_compat_8_def m -> forall m0 : state, mpl_compat_8_def m0 -> mpl_compat_8_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
predta_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map state, predta_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map state, predta_compatible_compat_def m0 -> predta_compatible_compat_def (M2 state m m0)
mpl_compat_7_2 : forall m : Map prec_list, mpl_compat_7_def m -> forall m0 : Map prec_list, mpl_compat_7_def m0 -> mpl_compat_7_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
st_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map prec_list, st_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map prec_list, st_compatible_compat_def m0 -> st_compatible_compat_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
union_s0d_2 : forall m : Map prec_list, union_s_prd0 m -> forall m0 : Map prec_list, union_s_prd0 m0 -> union_s_prd0 (M2 prec_list m m0)
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Set), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
union_std_1 : forall (a : ad) (a0 : prec_list), union_std_def (M1 prec_list a a0)
union_s_0d : forall m : state, union_s_prd0 m
union_s1d_3 : forall m : state, union_s_prd1 m
mpl_compat_8_3 : forall m : state, mpl_compat_8_def m
mpl_compat_7_3 : forall m : state, mpl_compat_7_def m
borne_0_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map prec_list) (p : prec_list), (prec_in_state m0 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m0) -> (prec_in_state m1 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m1) -> prec_in_state (M2 prec_list m0 m1) p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M2 prec_list m0 m1)
borne_1_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map state) (s : state), (state_in_dta m0 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m0) -> (state_in_dta m1 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m1) -> state_in_dta (M2 state m0 m1) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M2 state m0 m1)
MapGet_M2_bit_0_0 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = false -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m (N.div2 a)
Nat.le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m <= p -> n <= p
M2_eqmap_1 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m0 m2
mapcanon_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (y : A), P (M1 A a y)) -> (forall m1 m2 : Map A, mapcanon A m1 -> P m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> P m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> P (M2 A m1 m2)) -> forall m : Map A, mapcanon A m -> P m
MapGet_M2_bit_0_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = true -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m' (N.div2 a)
mpl_compat_1 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s0 s2
mpl_compat_2 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s1 s3
MapDisjoint_M2_l : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3) -> MapDisjoint A B m0 m2
MapDisjoint_M2 : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B m0 m2 -> MapDisjoint A B m1 m3 -> MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3)
MapGet_M2_both_None : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (a : ad), MapGet A m (N.div2 a) = None -> MapGet A m' (N.div2 a) = None -> MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = None
le_max_r : forall n m : nat, m <= Nat.max n m
mpl_compat_sym : forall s0 s1 : state, mpl_compat s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s1 s0
st_compatible_compat : forall s0 s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1
M2_eqmap_2 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m1 m3
makeM2_M2 : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A), eqm A (MapGet A (makeM2 A m m')) (MapGet A (M2 A m m'))
le_max_l : forall n m : nat, n <= Nat.max n m
st_compatible_compat_def = fun s0 : state => forall s1 : state, st_compatible s0 s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : state -> Prop
umpl_conv_0_inj : forall s0 s1 : state, umpl_conv_0 s0 = umpl_conv_0 s1 -> s0 = s1
borne_1_0 : forall s : state, state_in_dta (M0 state) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M0 state)
MapDisjoint_M2_r : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3) -> MapDisjoint A B m1 m3
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
in_M2_disj : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (m0 m1 : Map A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M2 A m0 m1) c = Some a) -> (exists c : ad, MapGet A m0 c = Some a) \/ (exists c : ad, MapGet A m1 c = Some a)
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
Map2_semantics_1_eq : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (f : ad -> option A), eqm A (MapGet A (M2 A m m')) f -> eqm A (MapGet A m) (fun a : ad => f (N.double a))

```    
intros m H1 m0 H2.
unfold union_std_def in *.
intros.
split.
- apply H in H1.
  apply H0 in H1.
  apply H1.
- apply H0 in H2.
  apply H in H2.
  apply H2.
```

original: intros m H1 m0 H2. unfold union_std_def in *. intros. split. - apply H in H1. apply H0 in H1. apply H1. - apply H0 in H2. apply H in H2. apply H2.
